all_data.title: Private room in farm stay in Nashik, India
all_data.description: Vihang Farmhouse is airy, bright, and simplistic with a wonderful view of the backwaters and grasslands of Gangapur Dam, an Important Bird Area! We are located a 20 minute drive away from Sula, York, and Soma vineyards and wineries which are on the opposite bank of Gangapur Dam. We have three bedrooms: The Florican Room, Owlet Room & the Quail Room. We also provide breakfast.

all_data.title: Farm stay in Tarur, India
all_data.description: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape. Be it a picturesque sunset or bright stary night Perfect get away from the hustle of your life and rejuvenate oneself.

all_data.title: Houseboat in Alappuzha, India
all_data.description: Come, savour the beauty of God's Own Country in one of Kerala's unique 'marvels' - the traditional 'Kettuvallam', a boat now re-incarnated as your floating home, away from home!A bamboo - thatched canopy sets the ambience for a river cruise that is bound to make you want time to stand still. Nestled within this canopy lies a complete home-unit, giving the comforts of modern living in a truly ethnic setting

all_data.title: Houseboat in Aryad South, India
all_data.description: Houseboat with 9bedrooms.Price mentioned is for 18pax.Additional persons can be accommodated on request.Ac will be provided from 9.00 pm to 6.00 am. Full time ac can be provided on request at extra cost

all_data.title: Boat in Alappuzha, India
all_data.description: Indulge in eco-luxury on Vembanad Lake aboard our transformed Kettuvalloms. Powered by solar energy, these floating homes blend tradition with modern comfort. Guided by skilled local fisherfolk, our crew ensures a seamless experience, from navigation to delightful meals. It's more than a cruise—it's an authentic journey into Kerala's culture, where tradition meets innovation. Immerse yourself in nature's sounds during your stay in this unique haven

all_data.title: Private room in houseboat in Kumarakom, India
all_data.description: Relax with whole family at this peaceful place to stay. You can check in with the building staff.

all_data.title: Boat in India
all_data.description: Highlight your Goa experience with a stay on the pristine backwaters of Goa's cleanest & most scenic river! We offer 3 bedrooms with a full kitchen, housekeeping staff & cook. Price include all meals, airport / hotel transfers by ac car. For special requests like a masseur, a celebratory meal etc, happy to oblige! Laid Back Waters is an authentic hand-made wooden houseboat that has featured in leading style magazines and has hosted some of the most elite guests in Goa... Welcome aboard!

all_data.title: Boat in Mullakkal, India
all_data.description: Beautiful house boat to spend a peaceful time with family or friends. you can experience the freshly prepared delicious Kerala food. it's equipped with fully furnished air-conditioned bedrooms.

all_data.title: Private room in serviced apartment in Kainakary, India
all_data.description: At the Riva Row Boat House, get into the kayaking mood! Riva Row Boat House is a lovely amenity in the Alleppey Backwaters that is ideal for a variety of situations, such as a family outing, a date, or group games. It's a terrific opportunity to explore the Alleppey backwaters from a kayak, and it's only a short walk from Kainakary jetty.After the day's activities, there's also a lovely evening in the water on a houseboat.

all_data.title: Room in hotel in Aryad South, India
all_data.description: You won’t want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place.Superhosts are experienced, highly rated Hosts.

all_data.title: Farm stay in Mahableshwar, India
all_data.description: Our place is surrounded by lovely strawberry farms.where you can take a nature walk ,pluck the sweetest and organic strawberries from our fields with your hands. Note- strawberry season is from october to april. Our rooms give you perfect view of valley and mountains.you can see the sun rising from the famous table land from our farmhouse.Enjoy your afternoon visting books village bhilar and engaging panchgani and mahableshwar and points.You can dine at our place in dinning or in your room.

all_data.title: Farm stay in Chikkamagaluru, India
all_data.description: NEST is the Perfect home for both families and groups. lies nestled in fifteen acres of secluded lush green coffee plantation and overlooks spectacular uninterrupted views of rolling hills .Breakfast is complimentary and one can look forward to simple tasty home cooked breakfast.our place located in Kabbinahalli village which is just 9 km away from the town where restaurants and sightseeing spots are easily accessible.

all_data.title: Entire home in chikmagalur taluk and district, India
all_data.description: Homestay is midst of coffee plantations surrounded by pepper and arecanut farm its malnad region and near to many tourist spots. Homestay is built in ancient style to provide best feel to the customers.One booking at a time,Complete homestay space will be provided to one team we wont take the second booking.

all_data.title: Farm stay in Hyderabad, India
all_data.description: The place is a newly constructed farm house in 7 acres of mango garden with 2 bedrooms, a swimming pool, a dining and lounge area, a separate party area(outdoor) , a kitchen and unlimited hi speed wifi available on Sharkarpally to Chevella road. (Close to Pragati Resorts)There is ample car parking available within the property.Since it has 2 bedrooms, the place is ideal for 4 people.This is the very first time that we are posting the listing on airbnb.
all_data.extra_offers_6: Private outdoor pool – available all year, open specific hours

all_data.title: Farm stay in Trimbak, India
all_data.description: A room with wifi that’s well suited for working.

all_data.title: Entire guest house in North Goa, India
all_data.description: A common area with wifi that’s well suited for working.Meditation, mental calmness & clarity was our main focus when creating this beautiful space.  Built in a Hexagonal style, it is a space that immediately soothes, calms and refreshes one’s entire being.  Surrounded on all sides with old Goan style stained glass windows that overlook the garden, this space is ideal when one wants to recharge and rejuvenate.

all_data.title: Entire home in Anjuna, India
all_data.description: The villa offers a double air conditioned bedroom, living space with sit out & 1single & 1small double size beds for the extra guests, kitchen has all the required kitchenette for all your cooking needs, one full bathroom with 24/7 Hot & cold shower in available, we provide daily housekeeping to our in-house guests, its a perfect place for family or friends of 4

all_data.title: Entire cottage in Canacona, India
all_data.description: A common area with wifi that’s well suited for working.
all_data.extra_offers_1: Public or shared beach access – Beachfront

all_data.title: Campsite in Dindigul, India
all_data.description: The feeling of living with nature is one that cannot be explained through words; but, one that should be experienced. The tent camping activity organised is one such activity that would satisfy all the requirements of the nature enthusiast in one, making him fall in love with nature all over again.

all_data.title: Campsite in Madikeri, India
all_data.description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape.this place covered with coffee estate and the floating river, river edge tent camp. Bring your pets along for the stay.

all_data.title: Private room in tent in Kaggodlu, India
all_data.description: Enjoy watching the beauty of nature amidst the coffee ,areca plantation . Bird and fish watching is an add on treasure for your relaxing trip . Fresh home cooked food will relish all time . You can go for fishing , boating ,Riffle shooting along with bon fire and music for few extra charges .

all_data.title: Entire home in Kodaikanal, India
all_data.description: This unique home is totally self sufficient with all the amenities you will need for a magical stay including fast unlimited WIFI, 24/7 hot water etc.It is a large open plan home with 32 foot high vaulted ceilings. It is part of Karuna Dham with 25 acres of private land with panoramic views, streams, waterfalls and much more! Our staff and restaurant are here for you.

all_data.title: Earthen home in Dindigul, India
all_data.description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape.A perfect hideout for peace lovers .It is a 3 bedroom sustainable Mud house located in a 5 acres property nearby kukkal lake which is far away from all the crowd and with complete privacy

all_data.title: Earthen home in Munnar, India
all_data.description: Perched atop a quaint hill, The Mudhouse is surrounded by the spectacular landscapes of Sahayadri, offering an epic panorama of the valley of Marayoor. Close to the treasured Sandalwood forest and Chinnar Wildlife Sanctuary.

all_data.title: Private room in earthen home in Parule, India
all_data.description: Experience the lush green interiors of the Konkan land, white sandy beaches, visit historic forts, majestic waterfalls, back waters or even take a short trek in the jungles of Konkan hitherto untouched – Gratitude Stays offers all this and more You get to experience the real Konkan and also stay near all the major tourist attractions of the region!

all_data.title: Earthen home in Udupi, India
all_data.description: first floor with AC..nature green 98- 4-40= 73 -992 hospitality clean spacious used mud jaggery limestone mud instead of cement, used rose and teak wood doors window, wooden craft collection s, three clean bathrooms wifi, complimentary breakfast ,kitchen, two balcony shot water, butter flies, peacock,Birds, easy accessible, safe silent, friendly host, approximately stay price 1000 per head, camp fire with extra charges.

all_data.title: Private room in villa in Mysuru, India
all_data.description: A room with wifi that’s well suited for working.

all_data.title: Private room in earthen home in Bengaluru, India
all_data.description: This house is an earth house full of light, air and a lot of positive vibes. We have a caretaker who helps in housekeeping. I can offer breakfast cereals with milk. The house is within walking distance to a major bus stop, auto-rickshaw stand, multiple veg and non veg restaurants, supermarkets, temples, medical stores, clinics etc. The most amazing part is the green space around the agricultural University which is huge and open for walk/run.

all_data.title: Earthen home in Auroville, India
all_data.description: This is a large self-standing, studio-bedroom with a dome shaped roof and excellent natural ventilation on all four sides. Set in a beautiful garden with a large fish pond, it provides a tranquil, rejuvenating getaway from busy city life. A private place to spend quality time with family and friends. (Free for accompanying child under 10 years.)

all_data.title: Tent in Kunchithanny, India
all_data.description: Very quiet place for families and bachelors . Very near to Tourist attractions and very beautiful views. Extremely clean and neat and we give 100% seriousness for hygiene. Friendly place for foreigners.

all_data.title: Entire villa in Kodaikanal, India
all_data.description: The property is located exactly 5kms from Kodai lake. (considered to be the centre of Kodaikanal) Easily accessible by Vehicles.Enjoy your weekends with the sound of birds chirping & Water flowing at this unique Zodiac Home stay!Well insulated pre-fabricated individual super structure.Safe for families with 24x7 CCTV surveillance
all_data.extra_offers_6: Free residential garage on premises – 3 spaces

all_data.title: Entire home in Ernakulam, India
all_data.description: Welcome to our humble islet residence, nestled in the tranquil backwaters of Kadamakkudy in Kerala. Surrounded by water on all sides, our four-bedroom house offers a unique and unforgettable experience for those seeking a peaceful retreat from city life.Kadamakkudy Koovalapoo Island Villa is an isle in the backwaters of Cochin near the tourism village, Kadamakkudy. Surrounded by water from all sides, Koovalapoo is a serene isle with natural beauty at its best around.

all_data.title: Farm stay in Kottayam, India
all_data.description: Superhosts are experienced, highly rated Hosts.

all_data.title: Farm stay in Kaggodlu, India
all_data.description: In the midst of a coffee estate, You’ll be staying at an ancestral home, filled with memories of happiness. There are 3 rooms with attached bathrooms, a dining area and two common areas. On cold nights we have an option of campfire, we can provide you with a barbecue as well. We serve traditional Coorg food, unless requested otherwise. We have water bodies to bask in the sun or just have a picnic with your friends and family. We have dogs, cows and chickens.We hope you enjoy your stay with us

all_data.title: Entire home in Arambol, India
all_data.description: A restful place with a lovely balcony from which you canenjoy beautiful sunrises and sunsets.Located 4 km away from the buzz of Arambol and also 4km from the beautiful calm of Keri Beach. Daily housekeeping between 10 and 2 pm .

all_data.title: Private room in bed and breakfast in Paravur, India
all_data.description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This eco resort offers ayurvedic treatments, massages, south Indian food and yoga every day.This beautiful and simple bungalow has a garden view.Our place is between the lake and the beach. 9 bungalows are in a beautiful tropical garden with many birds.This bungalow is for 2 people's maximum. Breakfast is included. Bedsheet is included.

all_data.title: Private room in hut in Munnar, India
all_data.description: There are two self-build houses: a treehouse and a mudhouse.View-Topia is a special place that will let you become one with nature; wake up with birds or with a magical view of the sunrise.In this place you will get the chance to escape from your busy life and completely relax. When the sky is clear you can fall asleep under the stars, what more could you wish for?

all_data.title: Room in boutique hotel in India
all_data.description: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.

all_data.title: Treehouse in Wayanad, India
all_data.description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape. A Villa that defines a new dimension of luxury. A well furnished Pillar house very near to river & forest, beautifully surrounded with farmland. Most excitingly we offer you the delicious homemade food,cooked with local spices

all_data.title: Hut in Karada, India
all_data.description: Arka offers a hidden getaway for adventurous romantics at our secluded 27 acre coffee and spice estate in a rural South Coorg village. A dreamy cottage where you can wake up to the sun kissing you and take long romantic walks in a paradise devoid of tourist traps. Thoughtful lighting and artwork coupled with a candle night dinner on the sitting deck creates the perfect ambiance for a intimate evening under the stars...

all_data.title: Private room in treehouse in Ramisera, India
all_data.description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape. High above the ground with a balcony that places you above a lazy river! Watch the wildlife make its way to the water before drifting back into the jungle and for a really unique experience fold the piano door and covert your living space into an open Hide!

all_data.title: Private room in treehouse in Poochakal , India
all_data.description: Olavipe Vatican farmhouse - Another name for rest and relaxation... Set amidst the lush greenery of Puchakkal , Alappy district , kerala, provides the perfect respite from busy schedules and city craziness...The place is set in a rural background complete with a tree houseproperty also houses a typical ancestral home with two attached bedrooms, hall and an antique style kitchen.The tree house and also the ancestral home are both attached bedroom with all modern facilities including Wi-Fi.

all_data.title: Treehouse in Kannan Devan Hills, India
all_data.description: Very quiet place for families and bachelors . Very near to Tourist attractions and very beautiful views. Extremely clean and neat and we give 100% seriousness for hygiene. Friendly place for foreigners. entire property for bigger groups , for small groups we can give you private rooms or a area with full privacy.

all_data.title: Private room in farm stay in Panamaram, India
all_data.description: The farmhouse includes guest rooms in the main. building  mudhouse and tree in the middle of the bio certified herbal plantation

all_data.title: Entire home in Kollam, India
all_data.description: This is one of the few places in the area with free parking.

all_data.title: Entire rental unit in Bengaluru, India
all_data.description: It's a 1bhk apartment which is situated in ITBP central area behind BTG tech park opposite to the lake have a beautiful view and walking track the apartment is best suited for family it's a peaceful area have no disturbance the flat has all basic amenities required,the flat is private not shared so privacy isn't a issue.

all_data.title: Campsite in Munnar, India
all_data.description: We are located at Kolukkumalai, Munnar ,Perched at an altitude of 7000 feet above sea level. If you are looking for an adventure, then we have the best suited accommodation in tents at munnar and kolukkumalai all the while experiencing the great outdoors and adventure in the wilderness and wide open spaces. We set up camps along the Sahyadris in and around the beautiful hill town of Munnar. From excellent local cuisine to a variety of outdoor activities, these camps are guaranteed to make camper's lives memorable.
all_data.extra_offers_5: Shared back garden – Not fully fenced

all_data.title: Campsite in Kodagu, India
all_data.description: Coorg river rock camping is located in outskirts of madikeri around 8km which is covered with coffee estate and greenery. It is located riverside and gives you thrilling experience to enjoy and feel the true beauty of nature

all_data.title: Entire rental unit in Benaulim, India
all_data.description: Set in a superb location, at a distance of 1 kms from the fabulous beach of Benaulim in South Goa, this is an exquisite 1 bedrooms fully furnished holiday apartment with a common swimming pool in a gated complex. The apartment has an equipped kitchenette and all the comforts one needs for a homestay while on a holiday. The apartment is on the ground floor.

lakes.description: It's a 1bhk apartment which is situated in ITBP central area behind BTG tech park opposite to the lake have a beautiful view and walking track the apartment is best suited for family it's a peaceful area have no disturbance the flat has all basic amenities required,the flat is private not shared so privacy isn't a issue.

treehouses.title: Private room in hut in Munnar, India
treehouses.description: There are two self-build houses: a treehouse and a mudhouse.View-Topia is a special place that will let you become one with nature; wake up with birds or with a magical view of the sunrise.In this place you will get the chance to escape from your busy life and completely relax. When the sky is clear you can fall asleep under the stars, what more could you wish for?

treehouses.title: Room in boutique hotel in India
treehouses.description: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.

treehouses.title: Treehouse in Wayanad, India
treehouses.description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape. A Villa that defines a new dimension of luxury. A well furnished Pillar house very near to river & forest, beautifully surrounded with farmland. Most excitingly we offer you the delicious homemade food,cooked with local spices

treehouses.title: Hut in Karada, India
treehouses.description: Arka offers a hidden getaway for adventurous romantics at our secluded 27 acre coffee and spice estate in a rural South Coorg village. A dreamy cottage where you can wake up to the sun kissing you and take long romantic walks in a paradise devoid of tourist traps. Thoughtful lighting and artwork coupled with a candle night dinner on the sitting deck creates the perfect ambiance for a intimate evening under the stars...

treehouses.title: Private room in treehouse in Ramisera, India
treehouses.description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape. High above the ground with a balcony that places you above a lazy river! Watch the wildlife make its way to the water before drifting back into the jungle and for a really unique experience fold the piano door and covert your living space into an open Hide!

treehouses.title: Private room in treehouse in Poochakal , India
treehouses.description: Olavipe Vatican farmhouse - Another name for rest and relaxation... Set amidst the lush greenery of Puchakkal , Alappy district , kerala, provides the perfect respite from busy schedules and city craziness...The place is set in a rural background complete with a tree houseproperty also houses a typical ancestral home with two attached bedrooms, hall and an antique style kitchen.The tree house and also the ancestral home are both attached bedroom with all modern facilities including Wi-Fi.

treehouses.title: Treehouse in Kannan Devan Hills, India
treehouses.description: Very quiet place for families and bachelors . Very near to Tourist attractions and very beautiful views. Extremely clean and neat and we give 100% seriousness for hygiene. Friendly place for foreigners. entire property for bigger groups , for small groups we can give you private rooms or a area with full privacy.

treehouses.title: Private room in farm stay in Panamaram, India
treehouses.description: The farmhouse includes guest rooms in the main. building  mudhouse and tree in the middle of the bio certified herbal plantation

earth_homes.title: Entire home in Kodaikanal, India
earth_homes.description: This unique home is totally self sufficient with all the amenities you will need for a magical stay including fast unlimited WIFI, 24/7 hot water etc.It is a large open plan home with 32 foot high vaulted ceilings. It is part of Karuna Dham with 25 acres of private land with panoramic views, streams, waterfalls and much more! Our staff and restaurant are here for you.

earth_homes.title: Earthen home in Dindigul, India
earth_homes.description: Reconnect with nature at this unforgettable escape.A perfect hideout for peace lovers .It is a 3 bedroom sustainable Mud house located in a 5 acres property nearby kukkal lake which is far away from all the crowd and with complete privacy

earth_homes.title: Earthen home in Munnar, India
earth_homes.description: Perched atop a quaint hill, The Mudhouse is surrounded by the spectacular landscapes of Sahayadri, offering an epic panorama of the valley of Marayoor. Close to the treasured Sandalwood forest and Chinnar Wildlife Sanctuary.

earth_homes.title: Private room in earthen home in Parule, India
earth_homes.description: Experience the lush green interiors of the Konkan land, white sandy beaches, visit historic forts, majestic waterfalls, back waters or even take a short trek in the jungles of Konkan hitherto untouched – Gratitude Stays offers all this and more You get to experience the real Konkan and also stay near all the major tourist attractions of the region!

earth_homes.title: Earthen home in Udupi, India
earth_homes.description: first floor with AC..nature green 98- 4-40= 73 -992 hospitality clean spacious used mud jaggery limestone mud instead of cement, used rose and teak wood doors window, wooden craft collection s, three clean bathrooms wifi, complimentary breakfast ,kitchen, two balcony shot water, butter flies, peacock,Birds, easy accessible, safe silent, friendly host, approximately stay price 1000 per head, camp fire with extra charges.

earth_homes.title: Private room in villa in Mysuru, India
earth_homes.description: A room with wifi that’s well suited for working.

earth_homes.title: Private room in earthen home in Bengaluru, India
earth_homes.description: This house is an earth house full of light, air and a lot of positive vibes. We have a caretaker who helps in housekeeping. I can offer breakfast cereals with milk. The house is within walking distance to a major bus stop, auto-rickshaw stand, multiple veg and non veg restaurants, supermarkets, temples, medical stores, clinics etc. The most amazing part is the green space around the agricultural University which is huge and open for walk/run.

earth_homes.title: Earthen home in Auroville, India
earth_homes.description: This is a large self-standing, studio-bedroom with a dome shaped roof and excellent natural ventilation on all four sides. Set in a beautiful garden with a large fish pond, it provides a tranquil, rejuvenating getaway from busy city life. A private place to spend quality time with family and friends. (Free for accompanying child under 10 years.)
